p: Guayule PI remains inside the vacuoles, for storage, till plant death. The epithelial cells around resin canals are therefore bifunctional cells: they are first dedicated to the biosynthesis and then they are remodeled to allow PI particles accumulation [ 38]. PI seems like a “dead-end product” and it was suggested that it acts to prevent damage to the photosynthetic apparatus under conditions of cold temperature, high light or other environmental stimuli [ 38].
